item.text: @#/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rang 'grel smad dum bzhugs so//

@##/ /bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pa nad sbyang ba'i sman sde sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga pa bshad par bya'o/ /skyug sman gyi sde la/ sman po son cha dang / shing mngar dang / ka lam pa dang /

nim pa dang / bim pi dang / bi sha la dang / ga gon ro kha ba'i thor to dang / 'bras bu dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs dang / mur ba dang / de ba ta li dang / lto'i srin bu gsod pa'i byi tang ga dang / bi dul dang / tsi tra ka/

kru drug tres dang / ba to la'i sa bon dang / ka rany+dza dang / pi pi ling dang / lce myang tsha dang / shu dag dang / sug smel dang / yungs kar dang / 'di rnams ni skyug sman du gtong ba'i sman gyi sde'i rnam grangs su gtogs so/ /de

la bkru sman du gtong pa'i sman ni/ tri bi da/ shing nye rong / dan ti dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / bi sha la'i rtsa ba dang / shing gi khu ba snu hag shi ra dang / me tog shang gi ri dang / ni li

dang / ro d+ha seng phrom dang / dong ga dang / ki bi l+yaka dang / su bar+Na shi ra dang / byar nu dang / ba gcin dang / 'di rnams ni bkru sman du gtogs so/ /bkru sman mas gtong ba'i sman gyi sna grangs ni/ po son cha dang / dug mo

yungs dang / ru rta dang / de ba ta li dang / shing mngar dang / shu dag dang / rtsa ba'i sman sna bcu la/ sa la par+Ni dang / kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang / kaN+Da ka ri dang / bri ha ti dang / gzem thog drung rtsa thon dang / 'di rnams ni sman gyi rtsa ba phra mo lnga zhes bya'o/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba dang /

ag ni man+tha dang / s+yo na ka dang / tang bal dang / pa ta li dang / 'di lnga'i rtsa ba ni rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ste/ rtsa ba che phra gnyis gcig tu bsdus pa ni rtsa ba bcu zhes bya ba dang / de ba da ru thang shing dang / rasna dang / ya ba ni la la phud dang / sha ta puSh+pa sha ti dang / kri ta be d+ha na dang /

rgya sran nag po dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lce myang tsha 'am/ rgyam tsha shing nye rong 'di rnams ni bkru sman mas gtong ba'i sde tshan du gtogs so/ /mgul ba yan chad mgo'i nad dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / log nad la sogs pa ci na yang rung ste/ sman sna nas btang zhing nad sbyang ba'i sman

sde la/ bel la dang / a pa marga dang / tsha ba rnam pa gsum po na le sham dang / li dong gra dang / pi pi ling dang / skyer ba'i rtsa ba dang / su ra la'i sa bon dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / pri ha ti'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang /

rtsa ba dang sna lnga dang / shi kru'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu rtsa bar bcas pa lnga dang / seng ldeng dang / shing ma du ka'i me tog dang / rgyam tsha dang / mig sman skyer khaN dang / pha bong gi dreg pa dang / sug smel dang / ldum bu pris rtsi ka dang / sman sde 'di rnams ni

mgul ba yan chad klad pa'i nad thams cad sel zhing sbyong pa'i sman du gtogs so/ /de la rlung nad sel zhing zhi bar byed pa'i sman gyi rnam grangs ni/ de ba da ru thang shing dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / sman gyi rtsa ba bcu rnams dang / ba la dang / a ti ba la dang / sman bi ra ta ra'i

sder gtogs pa la sogs pa dang / sman bi da ra'i sder gtogs pa rnams ni rlung nad sel to/ /mkhris pa'i nad tsha ba rnams sel ba'i sman gyi sde ni/ rtswa dUr ba dang / pUr+Na rna ba dang / nim pa dang / sman ba sha ka'i lo ma dang / rtsa ba'i bar du sna lnga dang / ad+ma kub ta kha sral phre'u dang /

'ol ma se'i rtsa ba dang / nye'u shi la dang / shi ta pa ki dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa dang / shing shug pa dang / sman thi ra rnam gnyis dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / thal tres la sogs pa 'di rnams ni mkhris pa'i nad sel to/ /bad kan gyi nad rgyas pa la ni dong

ga la sogs pa dang / shing arka la sogs pa'i lo ma me tog sna lngar bcas pa dang / shing mus ka ka la sogs pa rtsa ba dang 'bras bur bcas pa sna lngar bcas pa dang / shing o sa na la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i bar sna lnga dang / bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang / gla sgang

chen po la sogs pa dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs la sogs pa sman sde 'di rnams bad kan sel bar byed do/ /sman dzi ban ti'i sder gtogs pa la/ dzi ban ti dang / ram nye ba rnam gnyis dang / me da dang / mahA me da rnam gnyis dang / mon sran sde'u mung+ga dang / mon sran

ma sha gnyis kyi lo ma dang / ldum bu ri sha b+ha ga zangs rtsi ba dang / dzi ba ka dang / shing mngar dang / 'di bcu'i ming ni 'tsho byed ces bya'o/ /yang khar zhim la lus kyi sha 'tshag tshon por byed cing rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman sde'i rnam grangs la/ bi da ra dang /

dong ga dang / 'bri lci ka li dang / pur+Na rna ba dang / de ba dang / sa ha de ba dang / bu ba par n+ya dang / kha sral dang / dzi ba ti tsa phra mo sna bcu dang / shing sha ri ba thal tres kyi rtsa ba dang / lcug ma dang / hang sa pa ti dang / de ltar 'di rnams kyi spyir bi da ri'i grangs su gtogs

te snying la phan/ sha tshag brta/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad sel/ lus skem pa sha skye/ skran dang lhu tshigs dang / nywa gzhi na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / 'di rnams sel zhing phan pa'i grangs su gtogs so/ /yang lus tsha ba dang / khrag dang

mkhris pa rgyas te skom dad che zhing rims kyis btab pa 'di rnams sel ba'i sman ni/ shing sha ri ra ba thal tres dang / u shi ra dang / ka ma ri dang pa la/ shing ma du ka zhes bya ba dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / dmar po sna gnyis dang / shing mngar dang / ba ru sha ka dang /

'di rnams tsha ba'i nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / rims kyis btab pa la phan no/ /shing shug pa dang / li kha ra'i shing pun tra gnyis dang / rid d+hi dang / brid d+hi dang / ri dgas kar ka ta'i rwa shing gi zhes bya ba dang

sle tres dang / dzi ba na sna bcu dang / 'di rnams ni nu zho skye/ rlung nad dang / mkhris pa'i nad sel/ lus nyam chung zhing khong pa rmya ba lta bu la/ khong brta/ sha cher skye/ tsho bar byed/ bud med la nyal phod par 'gyur ro/ /yang sman pa ru sha ka dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra

dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / rgun 'brum dang / shing ni ri shi kad pa la'i shun pa dang / shing ka ta'i 'bras bu dang / shing tog rA dza dang / bal po se'u'i 'bras bu dang / rgya sne'u dang 'di rnams skom dad che ba dang chu sri ba dang rlung nad sel to/ /yang lig bu mig dang /

gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / spang spos dang / me tog pad+ma dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / skyer khaN dang / sug smel dang / shing mngar dang / nA ga ge sar dang / 'di rnams ni dug nad sel/ lus tsha ba dang mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad sel to/ /pa to la dang / ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel

dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / shing mngar dang / sle tres dang / shing pa tha dang / 'di rnams ni/ bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / mdze dang / rims dang / dug dang / rtag tu skyug bro ba dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / mig ser gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel to/ /yang gu ru

tse sle tres dang / shug pa dang / shing nim pa dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / 'di rnams ni mkhris pa dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / rims kyis btab pa dang / skyug bro ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / skom dad che ba dang / nad 'di rnams kyang sel to/ /zas

'ju pho ba'i drod skye/ dong ga dang / in+d+ra ya bdug mo yungs dang / pa li'i me tog dang / ka ka tig ta dang / nim pa dang / sle tres dang / rtswa dUr ba dang / shing mngar dang / pa tha dang / tsir tig ta zhes bya ba ci skrigs dang / shing shergya ka nI la puSh+pa dang ba na zhes kyang bya ba dang /

pa to la dang / ka na dza rnam gnyis dang / sab ta tsha zhes bya ba dang / shing gi 'dab ma rnam bdun dang / tsi tra ka/ kru trug tres dang / su sha bi dang / po son cha dang / shi ba na dang / gon ta dang / 'di rnams kun 'dra ste dong ga la sogs pas skyugs pa gcod/ mdze dang /

dug dang / rims dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / g.yan pa dang / gcin snyi ba dang / rma de ba 'byang ngo / /yang na sab ta tsha dang / shing lo ma bdun pa dang / shing ti ni sha dang / gro ba dang / shre ta ba ha dang / sri ki ya ka dang / shing seng ldeng dang / shing ka da ra dang /

b+han d+hi dang / shing sha pa dang / me sha shrI ga dang / tri hi ma dang / tal dang / rgya skyegs kyi shing dang / a ka ru dang / rgya sne'u dang / shing sA la dang / shing d+ha ba dang / ka bu ka dang / ka lang ka zhes bya ba dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mo yungs dang / tsha ga kar+Na dang / a shwa

kar+Na tha ram dang / de ltar a sa na la sogs pa sman 'di rnams ni/ sha bkra dang / mdze dang / bad kan gyi nad dang / khong na srin bu yod pa sel/ nad skya rbab dang / gcin snyi ba dang / tsho ches pa'i tshil nad 'di rnams sel to/ /shing ba ra'i me tog dkar po dang /

shing she rgya ka'i me tog sngon po la ba na dang / nye'u shing pa dang / tsitra ka dang / mo ra ta dang / shing bil ba dang / a za shwa gi dang / bri ha ti rnam gnyis ka rany+dza rnam gnyis/ dza ya rnam gnyis la/ ag ni man tha sna gnyis dang / shing shi kru'i 'dab ma/ bo'u pa la pa

dang / rtswa ku sha dang / ru rta 'di rnams ni shing bar na la sogs pa zhes bya ste/ bad kan gyi nad dang / tsho ches te tshil skyes pa'i nad dang / zas mi 'ju ste drod chung ba las/ rlung nad cher skyes pa sel/ klad pa na ba la phan/ skran dang / an ta bid tra b+hi khong 'bras 'di rnams

sel to/ /yang sman bri sha ka dang / spangs ma dang / shing kun dang / nag tshur rnam gnyis te/ nag tshur dang / nag tshur bya bal ma dang / rgyam tsha dang / shi la dza tu dang / 'di rnams ni chu sri ba dang / rde'u yod pa dang / khong na skran yod pa dang / lus kyi tshil ches

pa dang / bad kan sel to/ /sman be lan tar dang / a ran ni dang / su ga dang / bri sha dang / a sham be ta sru sru dang / go kan ta gze ma dang / ka ta dang / sa ha ra dza dang / ba na nI la puSh+pa dang / rtswa dUr ba dang / br-ik+Sha da ni dang / na la ku sha rnam

gnyis dang / kun tha dang / gun dra dang / ba lu ka dang / mor ta dang / ka ru ka ta dang / shing ram pa dang / parta dang / sman sde 'di rnams ni/ rlung nad du gyur pa sel/ chu son rde'u yod pa dang / gcin sri ste 'ong du mi rung ba dang / 'di rnams sel to/ /yang sman sha ba raka ro

seng phrom dang / bad thika ro d+hA dang / rgya skyegs kyi shing dang / dzi na dzi ni dang / thang shing par la dang / shing kad pa la'i shun pa dang / kud tsi tam pa dang / ldum bu chu skyes kyi me tog dang / me tog gi rtsa ba dang / shing a shwa ka dang / shing bita sho ka dang / e la ba lu ka

dang / sa ri pel ba dang / mo tsha rnams te/ de ltar sman rod+hA la sogs pa 'di dag ni tshil che ba dang / bad kan gyi nad sel bar byed/ bud med kyi mngal na ba la phan/ 'khru ba gcod/ sha mdog bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /dug nad sel to/ /shing ar ka'i rtsa ba dang /

shing a lar ka dang / nag dan ti dang / bil shal ya dang / b+har gi dang / rasna dang / pris rtsi ka li dang / sri ki rgya dang / shing a pa marga'i me tog dang / pi ta te la zhes bya ba ka ka da ni dang / ud kir yang dang / mahA she da dang / shing ing gu dang / de ltar ar ka'i

sder gtogs pa sman 'di rnams ni bad kan rgyas pa dang / tshil ches pa dang / dug nad rnams sel to/ /lto na srin bu yod pa dang / mdze nad zhi bar byed/ lhag par ni rma red par 'byang ste 'tsho'o/ /bye'u rug pa rnam gnyis te nag po dang / ser po dang / ku the rag zhim thig le

dang / ka lam la dang / srin bu sel ba'i sman byi tang ga dang / khar pad tra dang / bri sha kar+Ni dang / kad pa la zhes bya ba ro hi ni dang / ka sam mar dka dang / sha bka dang / shing ka pi ta'i lo ma dang / b+har gyi ka sra'i rtsa ba dang / rak+ta many+dza ri dang / ka ka ma rtsi mon sne'u

dang / ku la har dang / bi sha mus+thi dang / bu srin dang / buta ke shi 'bam po dang / sman 'di rnams ni bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/ bad kan rgyas pa dang / tshil che ba dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / 'di rnams sel/ cham pa na ba dang / zas yi

gar mi 'ong ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / 'di rnams la phan te rma rid pa 'byang / mus ka ka dang / sud+ha shi ri dang / 'bras bu gsum ste/ a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / tsi tra ka dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / shing d+ha ba dang / shing

sha ba dang / 'di rnams ni skran dang / gcin sri ba dang / chu son rde'u yod pa dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / tshil che ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang / bad kan dang / khu chu rnams sel bar byed do/ /dug mo yungs dang / shing mur ba dang / pu tse shel dang / na le sham dang /

al bi sha dang / gan d+hi ra chu sgog dang / sug smel dang / ba tha sna gnyis dang / zir dang / shing ar la'i 'bras bu dang / a za mo dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / zi ra nag po dang / shing kun dang / srin bu'i sman byi tang ga dang / pa shu gan+d+ha dang / pany+tsa ko la zhes bya

ba la/ pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la rtse lag dang / dbyi mo'i lo ma dang / tsitra ka dang / li dong gra 'di lnga dang / sman de rnams ni rlung dang / bad kan dang / tshil ches pa dang / cham pa dang / skran dang / rims na ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel bar byed do/ /

shu dag dang / gla sgang chen po dang / thang shing dang / sgron shing dang / li dong gra dang / bong nga dang / a ru ra dang / skyer pa dang / yung ba dang / shing mngar dang / kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang / dug mo yungs dang / sman 'di rnams ni shu dag dang skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangs su gtogs te/

zas ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs dang / rab tu 'khru ba'i nad rnams zhu zhing gcod do/ /tshil ches pa dang bad kan rgyas pa dang / rlung nad dang / bud med kyi nu ma na ba 'di rnams sel to/ /gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / mig sman ra gan gyi dud pa dang / lig bu mig dang / stang zil dang /

me tog pad+ma'i ze ba dang / lcim rtsa dang / btsod dang / ya ba sha ka dang / shing shal ma shi li dang / shing shal ma li'i khu ba dang / pu na nA ga dang / sa mang ga dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / me tog d+ha ta ki dang / am pa sh+tha dang / shing mngar dang / nam ska ri

dang / nam ti bri ga sha dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / ro d+hA seng phrom dang / da ta ki dang / shing bil ba dang / pe shing ka dang / ka tang ga dang / pad+ma'i ge sar ze ba dang / sman 'di rnams ni sman sde rnam gnyis te/ gan+d+ha pri yaM hang bu'i sde grangs su gtogs pa dang / sman am

bash+tha la sogs pa de rnams ni kha zas zhu ba'i tshad par 'khru ba gcod do/ /sman 'di dag ni 'khru ba yang gcod/ nang gi sha chad dang pags pa'i sha byung ba slar 'phros pa 'byor bar byed de phan/ mkhris pa rgyas pa la phan/ rma red pa yang 'tsho bar byed do/ /gla sgang dang / shu

dag dang / tsi tra ka/ kru trug tres dang / skyer pa dang / yung ba gnyis/ kha ba rnam gnyis la/ ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel dang / ka ka tig ta dang / go bye dang / pa tha dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / bong nga dkar po dang / bong nga nag

po dang / khra bo dang / ru rta dang / sug smel dang / shu dag dang / 'di rnams ni bud med kyi mngal na ba dang / nu ma na ba dang / dri ma bshang gci ba dang / rngul dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs pa la sogs pa sel cing 'byang ngo / /shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / shing a shwat+tha dang / shing u

dum+bA ra dang / paT+Ti ka ro d+ha sna gnyis/ 'dzam bu gnyis la/ bri had pha la dang / d+has swa pha la gnyis/ shing ardzu na dang / shing som bal ka dang / shing p+pak+sha dang / shing amra dang / shing ma bany+dzu la dang / shing pi la ya dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / shing nan ti ke li dang /

shing bir la dang / shing mngar dang / shing ma du ka dang / 'di rnams ni shing n+ya gro la sogs pa'i grangs su gtogs te/ rma 'tsho ste phan/ 'khru ba gcod/ chag thur byung na 'byor/ tsho ste tshil ches pa dang / mkhris pa rgyas pa dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / lus

kyi khong tsha ba dang / bud med kyi mngal na ba dang / 'di rnams sel te phan no/ /sug smel dang / ma he la dang / tu ruska dang / ru rta dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / spang spos dang / ba lang b+h+ya ma ka dang / sprig ka 'bug sug dang / zhog tang ku dang / tso tsa dang / gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang / rgya spos dang /

sti ni ya dang / spu ma zhes bya ba sri shing gi me tog gi khu ba dang / nya phyis dang / rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i chu srin gyi sen mo dang / thang shing dang / a ka ru dang / shri bas ga dang / gur kum dang / tsan+dan dang / gu gul dang / sa tsi ras dang / pog dkar po nu ma ka dang / sun na ma dang /

nA ga ge sar dang / 'di rnams ni sug smel la sogs te 'di dag dri zhim po'i sder gtogs te/ rlung nad dang bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel/ dug thub/ pags pa'i sha mdog bzang po sdug gur 'gyur/ g.yan pa dang / thor bu dang / bas ldag pa'i nad 'di rnams kun sel to/ /

sh+ya ma dang / dan di dang / dra ban ti dang / ka mu ka dang / dri bid shing nye rong dang / shang khri ni dang / pa tal dang / su bar+Na shi ri dang / gab ga shi dang / shi kha ri dang / kam pi l+yaka dang / sle tres dang / shing ka rany+dza dang / ba stad tri dang / bya d+hi ga ta dang / b+ha la dang / ba hu ra

sa dang / shing ro tsha ba rnams kyi 'bras bu ni sman sha ma la sogs pa'i sder gtogs te/ skran dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / snying na ba dang / chu 'gags pa dang / nad 'di rnams sel to/ /de ltar sman gyi grangs sum cu rtsa

gsum bshad pa la/ de dag gi nang nas sman la la ma rnyed na yang / sman gyi ro dang / mthu dang yon tan 'dra ba las sman sna sbyor cig /bkru sman dang skyug sman la sogs pa nad sbyangs pa'i sman sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa/ sman sde'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u bco lnga pa

rdzogs so// //snum dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug bshad par bya'o/ /snum gyi nang na mchog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ zhun mar dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / til mar dang bzhi'o/ /de ltar snum de dag ni spyir ni 'ju dka' ste lci/ bsil/ khong 'khru/

lus kyi khong snum par byed/ 'jam par byed rtsa thams cad du 'gro bas na zhib mnyen/ lus kyi khong rlan par byed do/ /zas snum bag 'di dang 'dra ba'i sman snum bag can du gtogs pa phal cher yang de dang 'dra'o/ /snum dang sman de dang mi 'dra ba

gzhan ni rtsub pa zhes bya'o/ /de la yang snum de dag gi nang na yang zhun mar sman dang sbyar te btsos pa ni ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du phan no/ /rkang dang tshil dang til mar gsum ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /de la zhun mar bas ni til mar 'ju dka'o/ /til mar bas ni

tshil 'ju dka'o/ /de la snum rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar ro/ /snum rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar dang rkang mar gsum mo/ /snum rnam bzhi ni zhun mar dang rkang dang tshil dang til mar bzhi la snum chen po bzhi zhes bya'o/ /de la snum gyi sman dpyad bya ba'i

nad dmigs ni/ chang nad du gyur pa dang / bud med kyis dub pa dang / drag shul dang / ngal ba'i las byas pa dang / sems las chen po la zhugs pa dang / mi rgan po dang / byis pa dang / nyams stobs chung ba dang / skem po dang / lus kyi khong na snum med de/ rtsub por gyur pa dang /

khrag zad pa dang / khu chu zad pa dang / rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa dang / mig rab rib khyer te rtul ba dang / rna ba mi gsang ste legs par mi thos pa dang 'di rnams lta bu la/ snum gyi bcud kyis lus brta bar bya'o/ /brta bar bya ba de la yang thog mar dugs byas la phyis bkru sman

gyis bkrus te/ sbyangs nas de'i rjes la snum gyi dpyad bya'o/ /ha cang khong pa me'i drod ches pa dang / lus sbom pa dang / nyam chung zhing rid pa dang / brla rengs pa dang / tshad pas rab tu 'khru ba dang / ma zhu be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang / lkog ma na ba dang /

dbyig dug gis phog pa dang / lto ba'i nang dmu rdzing lta bu dang / brgyal ba dang / rtag tu skyugs pa dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / bad kan gyi nad yod pa dang / skom dad che ba dang / chang gis phog ste ra ro ba dang / bud med bu btsas pa dang / sman sna nas btang ba dang / bkru

sman gyis bkrus pa 'di lta bu la snum gyi dpyad bya zhing sbyin du mi rung ngo / /de la zhun mar gyi yon tan ni sems rno mi brjed cing dran pa dang / yid gzhungs/ lus skem zhing rid pa 'di lta bu la phan no/ /til mar ni lto na srin bu yod pa dang / tshil ches pa dang / rlung nad can du gyur

pa 'di lta bu la til mar phan no/ /lus khong yang ba dang / lus khong grims shing sha mkhrang ba dang / lto sra ba 'di lta bu la rkang zos na phan no/ /lus la rlung dang nyi tshan gyis gdungs pa dang / lam ring por bgrod pas khong dub pa dang / smra mangs pa dang / bud med la

drags pa dang / drag shul dang / las ches pa dang / srog zungs bdun lta bu zad pa dang / lus kyi khong na snum med de/ rtsub por gyur pa dang nyon mongs pa byas pas lus rid pa dang / pho ba'i drod ha cang ches te zas ha cang 'ju ba dang / rtsa sgo kun rlung gis 'gags

shing 'tshangs pa 'di lta bu la tshil zos na phan no/ /de la tshil ni lhag par rus pa'i tshigs kha bye ba dang / rus pa chag pa dang gnad snad pa dang / lto ba'i nang grol na ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / lus rmas te rma byung ba dang / rkang lag gi tshigs bur ba dang / mo mtshan

na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / 'di lta bu la tshil phan no/ /til mar ni lhag par dbyar zla tha chungs dang / ston zla ra ba'i ngo la phan no/ /zhun mar ni ston zla 'bring po dang / tha chungs kyi ngo la phan no/ /rkang dang tshil ni dpyid ka phan no/ /snum 'di rnams gang yang

rung dus tshigs dang mi sbyor bar 'phral gang bab du gtong na/ tshes grangs kyi nyi ma bzang ba dang / srin dang yul ngan med cing yul bzang ba'i tshe thong shig /til mar ni dgun zla grang lhags che ba'i tshe btang na phan no/ /zhun mar ni dbyar zla ra ba dang / 'bring po tsha ba'i dus

na mtshan mo 'thungs na phan no/ /mkhris pa dang rlung nad du gyur na zhun mar ni mtshan mo yang gtang du rung ngo / /yang rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu nad sna gnyis 'dres par na na/ til mar dang zhun mar mtshan mo gtang bar rung ngo / /rlung dang bad kan gyi nad du gyur na/ zhun mar

dang sman dang sbyar ba nyin par thong shig /de bas na sman zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba'i til dang kha zas la sogs pa rnams dang / sman mas gtong ba dang / sman sna nas gtang ba dang / lus mar gyis bsku ba dang / sman bskol ba'i khu ba khar blugs shing dbo

ba dang / mgo dang rna ba dang mig tu sman bsku zhing blugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ran pa tsam du gtang ngo / /ro rnam drug la sogs pa sna re re ba dang / ro sna gnyis pa dang / ro sna gsum pa dang / sna bzhi sa dang / sna lnga pa la sogs pa sman sbyar ba'i ro bro ba'i sna grangs drug cu rtsa bzhi la

sogs par phye ba de las/ snum gyi dngos po mar la sogs pa ro logs shig na tha dad pa ma yin te/ ji lta zhe na/ sman mar sbyor ba yang / sman sna mang po sogs la/ mar nyung ngu byas pas na/ mar gyi ro zil gyis gnon to/ /lhag par bro ba med pas na ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du

'dus so/ /dper na ji skad du bstan pa/ sman bskol ba'i khu ba dang dngas ma btung ba'i ro de yang chu'i ro ci bro ba la sogs shig na rgyu lhag pa med de/ ro drug cu nyid kyi nad du 'dus so/ /yang ni sman mar myur du gang phan pa de bzang ste/ de la thun chung ngu zos na thun gnyis kyis

'ju'o/ /tshod 'bring du zos na thun bzhis 'ju'o/ /tshod cher zos na nyin zhag gcig gis 'ju'o/ /de ltar sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar ram/ sman mar gang za yang rung ste/ mi'i nyams dang nad kyi dmigs la sbyor la/ sngar ni tshod chung ngu nas bza' bar bya'o/ /yang bkru sman gyis

bkru bar 'dod na khar rtsang lta bu zas zos la/ da nang lta bu zhu ste khong na yang / zhun mar dang dngas ma 'ba' zhig tshod cher mang du bza'o/ /mar 'thungs pas nad zhi bar byas pa zhig la zas kyang cher ma zos te khong bkres na mar 'bring tsam du zos na phan no/ /sman mar gyis

nyams btsag brta zhing sha skye bar bya na/ dro khar sman mar nyung zad bzhu ste/ sha khu gdus la dro tsha tsam gyi nang du blugs la 'thungs nas/ de'i rjes kha zas snum bag zos la chang gis mnan na phan no/ /yang byis pa gzhon nu lta bu dang / mi rgan po dang / rtag tu skom dad che

ba dang / mar za ba'am/ 'thung mi phod pa dang / chang dad che ba dang / rtag tu bud med dang phrad de/ rtag tu kha zas snum bag za ba lta bu dang / drod chung de kha zas mi 'ju ba lta bu dang / skyid de bde bar 'dug 'dug pa'i mi dang / sman stobs chung ba'i mi nyon mongs pas

'jigs pa lta bu dang / lto snyi ba dang / nad dkyel mi che ba lta bu dang / so ga tsha ba'i dus dang / nad kyis rid par gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mar gtang ba ni/ dro ba sman mar nyung shas bzhu ste gcig tu 'thung ngam/ khu ba dron pos phul te 'thungs pa'i rjes la/ kha zas

snum bag dang chang 'thung shig /de la nad dmigs kyi rim pa dang sbyar te sman mar gtang ba'i thabs ni/ lus kyi stod na nad yod na ni kha zas zos pa'i rjes la mar phyis btung ngo / /khong pa'i nang lus kyi bar na nad yod pa ni kha zas phyed zos nas sman mar btung ngo / /lus

kyi smad na nad yod na ni/ dro khar lto stong la sman mar btang na/ rjes la kha zas dang tshil nan 'thungs na nad sel to/ /sman mar gtang ba'i thabs rim pa 'di ltar byas na phan pa'i stobs mthu yang / lus kyi rim pa bzhin du skye'o/ /de ltar sman mar 'thungs pa las mar cung

zad ma zhu na/ chu tshan gdu gdu ba'i dngas ma kha zas bzod tsam 'thungs na/ mar bde blag tu 'ju bar 'gyur ro/ /sman mar la sogs pa zos te/ snum kha'i nang du chags na/ chu tshan gdus pa khas bzod tsam gyis kha bkru'o/ /e raN+Da'i khu ba gdus pa dang /

ba la ta ka zhes bya ba go be dang / 'di gnyis su gdus pa'i khu ba ni btung du mi rung ngo / /gal te khar rtsang ngam/ khar nyin lta bu sman mar 'thungs pa las zhu 'am ma zhu gtol med de the tsom za na/ chu tshan gdu gdu ba yang 'thung shig /de 'thungs par khong du ma zhu

la/ ma zhu ba'i gdung sgregs mnan po ma yin sgregs pa yang tha mal par 'ong / khong yang zhing zas yi gar 'ong bar gyur na/ kha zas ran tsam du bza' zhing 'tshal nan kyang ci ran du 'thung shig /de ltar sman mar 'thungs nas zhu ba'i rjes la/ kha zas bza' ba

ni khu ba dro bag dang / zas bad kan du mi 'gyur ba dang / ha cang zas snum bag nyid ma yin pa dang / kha zas grang dro ma 'dres par bza'o/ /sman mar 'thungs pa lta bu kha lag kyang chu dron pos bkru/ bud med dang 'phrad du mi rung / mtshan mo yang gnyid

nyal/ bshang gci 'ongs na mi dgag /drag shul gyi las mi bya/ khro zhing tshig pa za ba dang / mya ngan dang / grang ba'am/ nyi tshan la 'dug pa'am/ rlung drag po langs pa'i khar 'gro ba'am/ rta zhon te phan tshun 'khyams pa'am/ lam du zhugs pa dang / mang du smra

ba dang / stan ha cang mtho ba la 'dug pa dang / sngas ha cang mtho ba 'am/ dma' ba 'di rnams lta bu mi bya'o/ /nyin par nyal ba dang / dud pa dku ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang / rdul khrod na 'dug pa 'di rnams kyang mi rung ste/ de lta bas na sman mar ci srid 'thungs pa de srid kyi

bar du/ cho ga de ltar bya zhing mi rung ba rnams spang ngo / /sman mar dang 'dra bar bkru sman btang ba dang / sna nas btang ba dang / sman mas gtong ba rnams kyang tshul de dang 'dra bar nad byang gi bar du cho ga yun de srid du bsrung bar bya'o/ /de la nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman

mar gtang ba'i cho ga ni bkru sman dang 'dra ste/ sman mar gyi cho ga yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /de la lto snyi na ni sman mar nyi ma gsum du gtang ngo / /lto sran ni nyi ma bdun du gtang ngo / /sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil te/ khong legs par snum par gyur na/ de phan chad kha zas kyi cho ga

bya'o/ /de ltar sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil bar gyur na/ stod smad du dbugs dbyung ba tha mal par 'ong / pho ba'i me drod ches te 'bar/ bshang ba snum la mi sri ba 'byung / mar dang snum bag mi 'dod de skyo/ lus snyoms te 'di ltar gyur na/ nad rtse zhil zhing lus kyi khong

legs par snum por gyur pa yin no/ /lus kyi khong rtsub na ni tshul 'di dang 'dra ste/ 'di las bzlog ste blta'o/ /gal te sman mar dang snum gyi tshod ma zin tam/ phan pa ma yin par zos sam/ gtang ba'i dus ma yin par 'thungs sam/ kha zas log pa ha cang snum ches

pa'am/ bsil zhing rtsub pa'am/ zas ma zhu bzhin du zos pa'am/ mtshan mo mi nyal zhing nyin par phan tshun 'khyam pa dang / mi mthun pa log pa byas pa 'di lta bu las sman mar ma zhu ste/ snum drags par gyur na/ gdong pa dang lus kyi sha mdog ser/ snabs dang mchil ma

mang / thur du tshad par 'khru ste/ de lta bu las nad ni lus skrangs pa dang / gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ngo / /khong rmya lus dgye sgu mi shes te/ rengs bag tu 'dug/ sems myos te blong bag tu 'dug /g.yan ba dang / mdze dang rims nad rtag tu skyugs pa

dang / khong na lto sbo/ mgo 'khor la sogs pa dang / 'di lta bu'i nad du 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu la dpyad bya ba ni zas dang skom dbri zhing bsdam pa dang / skyug sman gtang / dugs bya/ zas dang skom rnams rtsub pa'i bag gtang / 'tshal nan dar ba dang /

a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / 'di lta bu mnan pa'i khu ba dang / dar ba bskol ba dang / nas dang / tsi tse rgod dang / khre rgod dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra gsum/ sbrang rtsi la sbyar te btang pa'am/ yang na a

ru ra btags pa dang / ba gcin dang gu gul bsres nas 'thungs na phan no/ /mdor na nad dmigs ji ltar mi bde ba dang sbyar la dpyad byas na/ mar drags pa'i nad 'byang ngo / /yang de lta bu la dpyad du bya ba ni kha zas mi bza' ba ni bza' bar smyung ba mi nus na yang /

kha zas rtsub po bza' ba'i dpyad byas na smyung ba byas pa dang 'dra'o/ /gal te mar drags pa'i nad las bkru sman gtang dgos par gyur na/ nyi ma gsum gyi bar du kha zas snum pa khu ba drod bag dang / yul skams nas byung ba'i sha las khu ba drod pag tu byas pa dang /

kha zas drod bag zos la nang nub tu dugs bya zhing / nyi ma gsum du snum bag gi drod dang / dugs de ltar byas nas/ de'i rjes la bkru sman gtang ngo / /skyug sman gtang ba ni mi sha dang tshil ches/ bad kan mang / drod ma snyoms te/ zas res 'ga' 'ju/

res 'ga' mi 'ju ba de lta bu ni nyin zhag gcig bad kan skye ba'i kha zas sbyin la/ phyi de nyin skyug sman thong shig /yang zas snum bag gis bskyed bskyed pa/ bad kan can de lta bu la sngar zas rtsub po byin te/ de'i rjes la kha zas snum bag gis khong snum

par byas nas bkru sman thong shig /dpyad de ltar byas na mar dang snum bag las nad du gyur pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /mar dang snum lta bur ma 'phrod de nad du gyur pa kha zas kyi dpyad byas pas ma byang na/ sman btang ba'i dpyad byas pas nad kyi dri ma phyin par 'gyur ro/ /byis

pa chung ngu dang / rgan po la sogs pa mar dang snum bag spong mi nus la/ cho ga dka' na 'phral du snum gyi dpyad 'di skyo zhing gnod par yang mi 'gyur gyi gyis shig /bya ba'i thabs la mar brngos la sha khu las btang ngam/ thug pa'i nang du btab la blud do/ /yang

na til btags pa'i nang du mar btab la/ bu ram bskol ba'i khu bas btang ste btung ngo / /yang na 'bras dang til mar dang sran ma sha dang / sna gsum gyi thug pa nang du yang mar 'di bzhin du btab la btung ngo / /'o ma bskol ba dron mo'i nang du mar btab pa'i

thug pa'am zho mngal ma zhog chu bor la/ bu ram gyis btab ste blud pa'i thug pa de lta bu rnam pa drug dang / mar rkang tshil dang til dang sna bzhi 'bras dang sna lnga'i thug pa dang / spyir drug dang / yang thug pa rnam pa lnga po 'di dag dang / thug pa sna bdun po 'di rnams ni 'phral

du lus kyi khong snum par 'gyur te/ lan tshwa cher gdab bo/ thug pa 'di dag ni bad kan du mi 'gyur ro/ /lus rtsub par mi 'gyur/ yang mdze nad lus skrang bag dang / gcin rtag tu 'ong zhing snyi ba 'di lta bu la/ bu ram yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang /

lo ma dang til dang / sran ma sha dang / chang dang zho rnams bzar mi rung ngo / /snum gyi cho ga dang / dpyad byas nas gnod par ma gyur na/ sman 'bras bu gsum po dang / pi pi ling dang / a ru ra dang / gu gul la sogs pa bskol la thong shig /de ltar btang na

nad rnying la yang 'byang la/ lus kyi khong nas drod skye/ khong pa nang gi nad kun 'byang / srog zungs bdun 'phral du brta/ nyams stobs dang bzhin mdog bzang por 'gyur/ dbang po rnams brtan/ rgan sra/ lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ mar rtag tu bza' ba'i yon

tan de ni de ltar 'gyur ro/ /snum la dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas dugs bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la dugs kyi bye brag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ dugs bya ba dang / bag zan dang sman du sbyar bas lus la bcing zhing

dugs bya ba dang / dugs tha mal pa dang / chu lums dang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /de la dugs zhes bya ba ni me la bsros pa yin te/ de la yang ji lta zhe na/ me mdag la gos sam/ thong lcags sam lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa la sogs pas dugs bya'o/ /bag

zan dang sman du sbyar ba'i dugs lus la glan cing bcing ba ni bag phye 'am 'bru sna tshogs btags la sman shing tsha dang phabs dang nye'u shing dang thang shing dang gu gul dang / a ru ra dang / ldum bu ra sna dang / e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang /

tshwa dang / dar ba dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / 'di rnams kyis sla mor sbrus la lan tshwa cher btab ste btsos la ras kyi steng du bdal te/ lus gar na sar glan zhing bcings na dugs 'dis ni rlung nad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bad kan dang 'dres pa'i nang

du gyur na ni dugs de'i nang du bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang sbyar la dugs bya'o/ /mkhris pa'i nad la ni shing shug pa dang sbyar ro/ /dugs glan te de ltar sbyar ba las/ gal te sla bas lus la mi chags shing ras kyis mi thub na mar dang til mar la sogs pa snum gyis

bsnan te/ yang dang yang bswo zhing pags pa ma rul ba dri mi zhim pa ma yin pas phyi rol nas dugs bya'o/ /phags pa de lta bu ma rnyed na sman rlung sel ba'i lo ma a shwa gan+d+ha'am/ e raN+Da'am/ dar ram bal snam mam ras kyis g.yogs shing dkris la mtshan mo dugs byas

na ni nyin par mi dgos kyi khrol cig /nyin par dugs byas na ni mtshan mo mi dgos kyi khrol cig /de la dugs tha mal pa zhes bya ba ni bag phye dang mar dang chur sbyar te/ btsos pa'i bag zan sla mos/ gang na ba'i thog tu glan cing bdugs pa dang / gyo mo'i

dum bu dang / phag dum dang / rdo ba dang / sa phye ma dang / gso ma'i lo ma dang / 'bras la sogs pa 'bru rnams dang / lug gi ril ma dang bye ma dang / phub ma la sogs pa thabs du mas btsos sam/ brngos pa'i dugs kyis yul gyi rnams dang dus dang sbyar zhing dugs bya'o/ /

de la sman khu'i lums bya ba'i dpyad ni/ shing shi kru dang / shi kru'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa ji snyed pa dang / shing e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma la sogs pa dang / ka rany+dza dang / byi'u rug pa dang / kardza ka dang / shing shi ri sha dang / ldum bu ba sha

dang / 'od ma dang / shing arka dang / ma li ti dang / dir+g+ha bin ta dang / gso ma'i lo ma dang / shu dag la sogs pa dang / yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang / nya dang / ngang ngur la sogs pa'i sha dang / sman gyi rtsa ba sna bcu pa dang 'di rnams la sogs pa nad dmigs

dang sbyar la nad lci na sman 'di kun sna tshang bar bsogs te brdungs la chang dang tshwa dang 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa dang sbyar te btsos la bum pa'i nang du blugs la gang na bar sman gyi rlangs pa dron mos gar na ba'i dmigs su bdug cing lums bya'o/ /yang na rlangs pas mi bdug par sman btso

btso ba'i khu ba dro tsha tsam bum pa'i kha phra mor btod pa'am/ sbu gu ring por btod pa'i/ blugs pa'i kha nas sman gyi khu ba'i rgyun byung nas nad kyi steng du blugs shing sman khu'i lums bya'o/ /de ltar sman khu'i lums byed pa'i tshe lus la gos kyis kyang g.yogs la de'i steng du sman

khu'i chu lums kyis lus la bde ba ran par blugs shing lums bya'o/ /yang na sman khu dron mo de gzhong khung lus tshad chen po'i nang du gang bar blugs la de'i nang du lus zhugs na rlung nad thams cad la phan par 'gyur ro/ /nad pa chu lums de lta bu'i nang du zhugs te 'dug

na gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ba dang chu 'gags te gcin sri ba dang / rlung nad la sogs pa la phan no/ /de lta bu'i lums bya zhing 'jug pa la kha zas snum bag bza' zhing zas zhu nas snga dro chu lums bya'o/ /de ltar lums bya ba'i tshad ni nad pa'i nad dmigs che chung dang /

yul rnams dang dbyar dgun gyi dus dang sbyar la lums che chung 'bring gang ran pa tshod de las dpag ste bya'o/ /de las bad kan gyi nad dmigs shas che na ni sman khong rtsub par 'gyur ba dang sbyar la chu lums bya'o/ /mi rang bzhin rlung dang bad kan can zhig la rlung nad skyes te

rtsub par gyur na/ sman rtsub pa dang snum bag yod pa gnyi ga dang sbyar ba'i chu lums bya'o/ /yang nad pa pho ba'i nang du rlung nad zhugs pa la/ long ka'i nang du bad kan gyi nad zhugs par gyur pa 'di lta bu la ni sngar pho ba'i gnas la phan pa'i lums rtsub mo'i lums bya'o/ /

long ka'i nang na bad kan yod pa ni so so'i gnas kyi bye brag dang sbyar te snum bag yod pa'i lums bya'o/ /de la dugs dang lums gang byed kyang rung ste/ sta zur dang chu so'i bar dang / mig dang rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang / snying dang 'di rnams la dugs chung du bya'o/ /yang

na ni ma byed cig /lums legs par byas pa'i tshul ni khong grang zhing bsil ba kun med/ zug cing na ba byang / lus dang rkang lag 'jam pa de lta bur gyur na lums legs pa yin te lums kyi rjes su lus dal gyis mnye zhing de'i rjes la chu dron pos lus khrus byas nas

de'i 'og tu snum gtong ba'i cho ga gyis shig /yang lums ha cang drags na nyen du gyur pa'i nad dmigs ni/ mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas te tsha ba'i nad skye/ skom dad che/ myos shing brgyal ba'am/ bog par 'gyur/ skad 'gags/ rkang lag na/ mgo

'khor/ rkang lag gi tshigs kun na/ rims tsha bas 'debs/ lus kyi sha tshig ste nag po dang dmar po thig thig por snang / lums ha cang drags na skyug bro ba 'di lta bu'i nyen du 'gyur ro/ /lums de ltar ha cang drags te/ tsha ba dang mgo 'khor ba dang / skyug bro

ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang dug gis phog pa dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i tsha la sogs pa'i sman btang ngam/ me btsa' btab bam/ mes tshig gam/ tshad pas btab bam/ skyug bro 'am/ snying mi dran te myos pa 'di rnams lta bu la/ lums

rtsi eN+Da dang / nye'u shing lta bu dang / nya dang chu bya sna tshogs lta bu ni/ bsil zhing lci ba'o/ /tsha zhing rno ba na le sham lta bu dang / drod che ba'i sman tshid ka dang / dbyi mo'i lo ma 'di lta bu rnams sbyar te so so'i nad dmigs la lums ci rigs par byas na nad dmigs kyi nyen de lta

bur mi 'gyur ro/ /lums rtsir bzang ba ni rlon zhing zhu ba yod pa sra ste tshos dka' ba spyi bag dang / 'byar bag tu 'dug pa dang / snum bag dang / rtsub pa'i bag dang / rtsa ba'i nang du 'gror rung ba/ zhib pa de lta bu'i sman ni lums rtsir bzang ngo / /lums kyis nad dang / nyen

du mi 'gyur ba'i sman rtsi ni 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa dang / zhib pa dang / 'byar ba spyi bag 'dug pa dang / zhu ba gsher bag can 'di lta bu la sbyar na lums ma legs te nad du gyur pa las rtse zhil te phan par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sman kha ba dang / bska ba dang / mngar bag 'di

gsum yod pa phal cher sbyar na lums nyes pa'i nad thams cad rtse zhil zhing phan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lums ha cang drags pa las nad du gyur pa de slar bcos pa'i thabs kyis nad rtse zhil bar 'gyur te/ phan pa'i rtags ni gang du lums drags pa'i nyen smos pa'i nad rnams

byang la/ nyams stobs skye bar tshor na de ni lums drags pa'i nad phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /yang lums drags ches te nad du gyur pa de rtse zhil ba'i thabs ha cang drags ches na yang / sha mdangs kyi pags pa dang / chu ba dang / rkang lag rnams 'khums par 'gyur/ snying

'phar zhing na/ smra mi nus/ 'grams pa'i nya byung ste ltung / mchu dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa rnams nag por 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ha cang rtse zhil drags pa'i nad yin no/ /de la dugs byar mi rung ba'i dmigs ni ha cang tshon po sbom po dang / rlung ches

te khong rtsub pa dang / rid par gyur te nyam chung ba dang / brgyal ba dang sngar lums drags pa las slar gso zhing dpyad bya dgos pa dang / glo na ba dang / glo rdol ba dang / srog zungs bdun po zad de lus skam por song ba dang / lus khur ram las kyis dub pa lta bu dang /

chang las nad du gyur pa lta bu dang / mig rab rib za ba dang / dmu rdzing du gyur te lto cher skyes pa dang / shu ba mched pa dang / mdze nad dang / 'or nad skrang bag dang / tsha ba mkhris pa'i nad yod pa dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang mar 'thungs pa dang / sbrang rtsi 'thungs

pa dang / bkru sman btang ba dang / lus snad pa dang / gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / mya ngan gyis btab pa dang / 'jigs shing bag tsha ba lta bu yod pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'am mig ser gyis btab pa 'am/ skya rbab

kyi nad yod pa 'am gcin snyi ste rtag tu 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang / spyir mkhris pa'i nad yod pas tsha ba'i nad che ba 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung / bud med sbrum ma dang / zla mtshan zag pa dang / bu btsas pa lta bu dang / 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung ngo / /gal te

sbrum ma 'am zla mtshan zag pa dang bu btsas pa 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung ba 'am/ dug gis phog ste lums bya dgos na yang lums mi drags pa 'jam por gyis shig /de la lums bya ba'i nad kyi dmigs ni bad kan ches te dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu

ba dang / cham pas btab pa dang / skyigs bus btab pa dang / lto sbos pa dang / bshang gci gnyis ka 'gags te dbyung du mi rung ba dang / mgul subs shing skad 'gags pa dang / rlung nad kyis bag tu mi bde ba dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / be'u snabs

yod de mchin pa na ba dang / lus dgye sgu mi shes te khong rengs pa dang / lus lci ba dang / rlig rlugs kyi nad yod pa dang / mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang / da rgan lus nang du sgu ba 'am/ phyir dgye ba'i nad kyang rung rlung nad kyis zug thabs su na ba dang / chu

'gags pa dang / thor bu chen po byung ba'am/ rmen bu skrangs pa'am pags pa'i nang du thor bu 'byung la phyir rdol du mi rung ba lta bu dang / skyes pa khu ba 'gags te 'ong du mi rung ba dang rlung nad che ba dang / 'di rnams lta bu la so so'i nad dmigs dang

mthun par sman sbyar la lums dang dugs bya'o/ /yang mi la rlung nad yod pa'am tsho ste tshil ches pa'am/ bad kan rgyas pa de lta bu la lums btsos shing gdu gdu ba mi dgos par khang pa rlung med pa dron po'i nang du gos bsros la dron po gyon te rngul dbyung ba dang gos lci bar gyon

cing rngul bar bya ba dang / dngang bar bya zhing rngul gdon par byas na lums bya mi dgos par phan no/ /yang me la btso ba'i lus btsan po che ma yin par tha mal par zan dang / sman du sbyar bas btsos pas lus la dkri zhing bdugs pa dang / chang mang du blud la dugs byas na phan

no/ /rngul mang du dbyung ba'i thabs dang / khro bar bcas pas rngul dbyung ba dang / bkres par bya ba dang / skom par bya ba dang / nyi tshan la gzhag pa 'di lta bus kyang bad kan la sogs pa'i nad lums bya mi dgos par phyin par rung ngo / /de lta bas na lus dang khong pa nang gi

nad yod pa la mar dang til la sogs pa snum gyi dpyad kyis ni nad bsrul lo/ /nad bsrul de khong pa nang khrol gyi nang du song yang rung / srog zungs bdun gyi nang du song ngam/ rtsa'i nang du song ngam/ rkang lag gi nang du song ngam/ nad rung ba'i nang du zhen kyang rung /

de lta bu la lums sam dugs byas na snum gyis bsrul ba'i nad de snyi zhing sla bar gyur nas khong du sdud do/ /khong du nad lus pa dang bkru sman gyis bkrus te nad kyi dpyis dbyung ngo / /dugs dang lums kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //skyug sman dang

bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa bshad par bya'o/ /bad kan rgyas pa'i nad dam bad kan rgyas pa rlung ngam mkhris pa dang 'dres kyang rung ste/ de lta bu'i sman la skyug sman thong shig /tshul 'di dang 'dra bar mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la ni bkru sman thong shig /

yang rims gsar pa dang / tshad pas 'khru ba dang / thur du mkhris pa dang khrag tu 'khru ba dang / glo gcong chen po skem byed dang / mdze dang gcin snyi ba dang / 'brum chen dang thor bu 'byung ba'i nad dang / rkang pa cher skrangs pa'i nad dang snying mi dran te myos par gyur pa dang /

lud pa lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / snying 'phar ba dang / bud med nu ma na ba dang / ro stod yan chad kyi nad mi bde ba 'di rnams dang nad thams cad la skyug sman btang na phan no/ /de la skyug sman gtang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni bud med sbrum ma dang / rlung

nad yod de khong rtsub pa dang / bkres pa dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang / mi rgan po dang skem po dang tsho ste sbom po dang / glo skam na ba dang / mtshon gyis rmas pa dang / nyam chung ba dang / rtag tu slon pa dang / mcher pa na ba dang / mig rab rib

khyer ba dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / khar khrag dang / rlung du 'dres par 'byung ba dang / so na ba dang / skad 'dzer ba dang / chu sri ba dang / dmu rdzing dang / skran dang / sman btang ba yang slon du mi rung ba dang / ha cang drod che ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang /

rtug skam gyis btab pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rtsib logs rdo bzhin du sra bas rem rem por nad dkyel chags pa dang glo na ste rtsib logs su zug pa dang / rlung nad kyi bag 'di lta bu la skyug sman gtang du mi rung ngo / /yang khrag sman gtang du mi rung ba ni btsan dug

'thungs sam/ dbyig dug 'thungs sam kha zas ma zhu ba 'am kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa'am/ be'u snabs las rims su gyur tam/ rtag tu skyug sman btang yang skyug tu mi rung ba la skyug sman mi gtang bar/ gong du smos kyang dug 'thungs sam/ skyug sman mi btang

du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs zhig yin na 'di rnams lta bu la skyug sman thong shig /nad dmigs gzhan dang sbyar te skyug sman btang ba'i rjes la sman gyi dud pa sbu gu nas btang ste bdug tu rung ngo / /btsan dug dang dbyig dug gis phog pa dang / zas ma zhu ba 'am/ kha zas mi

'phrod pa zos pa 'di rnams lta bu la skyug sman btang ba'i rjes la dud pa sbu gu nas btang zhing bdug pa dang / zas kyi cho gas bstan pa 'di rnams byar mi rung ngo / /de la bkru sman gyis bkru zhing gsor rung ba'i nad ni skran dang gzhang 'brum khrag tshad dang 'brum bu

dang gzhogs phyed na ste bskyod mi nus pa dang / mig ser dang / rims yun ring du lon te bying ba dang / dmu rdzing dang / dbyig dug dang / rtag tu skyug pa dang / mcher pa na ba dang / sha mdog ser por gyur pa'i nad dang / mig rab rib za ba dang / mig sngon por gyur pa dang /

mig rtsi bor za ba dang / long ka na ste lte ba'i 'og tu na ba dang / mo mtshan na ba dang / pho mtshan na ba dang / khong pa'i nang kun na ba dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / rma red pa dang / dreg gam/ khar khrag dang rlung 'dres par skyug gam/ mgo bo yan chad kyi nad dang / khrag rgyas

pa dang / gcin 'gag cing sri ba dang / rtug skam gyis btab pa 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman gyis bkrus na phan no/ /mdze nad dang / gcin snyi ste za khur byung ba la ni/ skyug sman btang na phan no/ /rims sar pa dang / pho ba'i drod chung ba dang / mkhris pa dang / khrag tshad

byung ba dang / glo rdol tam/ lus rmas sam/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba 'am/ tshad pas 'khru ba'am/ khong du mtshon lus te ma phyin pa dag lto sra ste 'khrur mi rung ba dang / lus tsho ste tshil che ba dang / skem po dang 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman btang zhing bkrur mi rung ngo / /de la

skyug sman dang bkru sman gnyis gang yang rung ba'i dus ni grang dro ran pa'i dus la bya ste/ de yang dpyid zla 'bring po dang dbyar zla tha chungs dang / ston zla tha chungs dang zla ba 'di rnams la bkru sman dang skyug sman gang yang rung ba gtang du rung ngo / /dus 'di'i tshe snum gtang ba'i

cho ga bzhin du yang byas/ dugs dang lums kyang cho ga bzhin du bsal/ sang skyug sman btang na deng bad kan slong ba'i kha zas nya dang til dang / ma sha mon sran gre'u dang bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas rnams zos la/ mtshan mo gnyid log par byas nas kha zas

legs par zhu ba dang / nang par lus bsrung ba'i bkra shis byas la kha zas gzhan mi za bar skyug sman gtang / mi rgan po dang / byis pa dang / nyam chung ngu skye ba dang / sman stobs chung zhing zhan pa 'di rnams so so'i rigs par gtang ba'i thabs ni mkhris pa rgyas shing tshab che na

'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ bu ram gyi khu ba las thong shig /rlung nad la ni sha khu 'am/ mar khu'am/ thug pa dang / snum bag las thong shig /bad kan rgyas pa la ni sbrang rtsi'i khu ba dang / chang dang chu dron po las gtang ngo / /rgan gzhon dang nyams che chung gi

thabs kyang tshul 'di bzhin du sbyar ro/ /skyug sman btang ba yang babs cher 'thungs te gre ba man chad gang bar gyis la slon no/ /so so'i nad dmigs dang sbyar te/ skyug sman du gtong ba gang yang rung ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang / rgyam tsha dang / lce myang tsha yang btab la mi'i

tshod dang / skyug pa sra snyi'i drod du sbyor la sman thong shig /sman gtong ba'i tshe nad pa kha shar phyogs su bltas la sman blud do/ /sngags kyis kyang gdab par bya'o/ /bra h+ma dak+Sha shi be/ bud d+hen dra/ b+hA tsan+d+ra arka nI la na la/ ri dir su ma b+hU ta sang+g+has tsa

pan tu pa/ sa ra ye na me ba ri Shi na ma de bA na me bA me mer ta ma su d+he bot+ta ma nA ga nAn b+he Sh+ya dz+yam na mastu ste/ skyug sman 'thungs la skad cig ci ran du bsdad la de nas slon bro ba'i sems bskyed la/ dong gar 'khyil zhing khar mchil ma mang po 'ong bar gyur na bya sgro 'jam po'am/

chu ba snyi ba 'jam po bkug cing drang ngo / /bkug cing slon pa ni gre ba dang lce khyi ba'i drung ma smad par slon to/ /de la skyug mi bro bzhin du yang nan gyis skyugs shing slon du mi rung ngo / /skyug bro bzhin slon par gyur na yang ma 'gegs par slon cig /de ltar slon pa'i tshe na stan mthon

po pus mo'i thad ka tsam du mtho ba'i steng du tsog pur 'dug la dpral ba dang / glo g.yas g.yon mis brten nas slon to/ /de'i tshe slon pa de lte ba'i thad kar btsir/ rgyab nas btsir zhing gyen du phul la slon cig /de la bad kan rgyas pa'i skyug sman rno ba'i bag la na le sham lta

bu dang / bsil bag tu u shi ra'am/ tsan+dan nam/ ga pur lta bu la sogs pa la sbyar ro/ /drod che ba'i bar la tsi tra ka /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa lta bu dang / tsha bar gtogs pa tsha ba rnam gsum dang / shi kru la sogs pa 'di lta bu las skyug

sman du sbyar te gtang ngo / /mkhris pa rgyas pa'i skyug sman ni ro mngar bag shing mngar 'o ma 'am bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ kha ra 'am/ rgun 'bru lta bu dang / bsil bag tu u shi ra 'am/ tsan+dan nam/ ga pur la sogs pa la sbyar ro/ /rlung dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad la ni

mngar bag dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa las sbyar la gtang ngo / /de ltar skyug sman du sbyar te gyen du phul nas nad phyin pa'i tshad ni bad kan 'byung ba zad nas mkhris pa snang gi bar du slon cing skyugs shig /gal te skyug sman btang ba las sman gyi mthu shugs zhan te/ babs cher mi

slon tam sman 'ga' zhig slar brgal na bsnan pa'i dpyad ni/ pi pi ling dang / skyu ru ra dang / yungs kar rnams shel tsha dkar po'am lce myang tsha'i chur sbyor la/ yang yang slon cig /sman gyis de ltar bsnan kyang slon du mi rung na/ skyug sman nyes pa yin te/ de'i nyen ni

mchil ma mang / g.yan par 'gyur/ thor bu mang / rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /skyug sman btang legs na dang por bad kan 'byung / de'i rjes la mkhris par slon/ mjug tu rlung gi tshul dbu ba lta bu 'byung ba ni skyug sman legs pa yin no/ /

de la ha cang skyug sman drags pa 'am nad dkyel che na mang du slon pa'i rjes la dbu ba dang khrag tshon bag can du byung na gso dka' ba yin no/ /de ltar sman drags te ma legs sam nad dkyel ches te nyam chung la slon drags na khong rmya/ lus tsha/ gre ba skam/ mig gis mi mthong ste mun

par snang / rlung nad yang ba ldang / khong nas srog ces bya ba'i khrag yod pa de slon cing 'byung na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /skyug sman btang legs na de'i rjes la ci ran cig ngal bso ste/ de nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la/ dud pa rnam gsum gang yang rung ba cig gis bdugs la

de'i 'og tu snum bag gtang ba yang gong ma dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /de nas kha zas bza' ba ni phyi 'phred nub ka'am/ yang na sman legs par ma zhu 'am/ rjes ma chad na phyi de nang par tsam na gdod kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing bkres na chu dron po ran pas khrus byas la kha zas kyi rim pa

'bras thug rkyang rkyang po la rim pa bzhin du bza' bar bya'o/ /bza' ba'i rim pa de yang dang po 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa rkyang rkyang po blud do/ /de nas 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa phyar langs tsam du byas la blud do/ /de'i rjes la thug pa kha gzar gyis bcu rung ba blud do/ /de'i

rjes la sran tshod yu sha zhes bya ba bal po se'u 'bru dang sran bu dkar sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras chan du spags shing bza'/ de nas sran mung+ga dang / bal po se'u 'bru dang spod sna tshogs su sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras chan du spags shing bza'/ mjug tu ni khu sha dang 'bras chan

du spags shing bza'o/ /de ltar slon pa'i rjes la kha zas tshod che chung bza' ba'i tshad skyug sman legs te/ legs par slon la dang ga sang sang por byas na thug pa dang / sran tshod yu sha dang khu sha gsum char zos kyang rung ngo / /'bring tsam du slon na ni 'bras thug dang /

sran tshod yu sha dang / rnam pa gnyis ka bzar rung ngo / /slon pa'i babs chung ste/ chen por ma slon na ni khu sha dang kha zas 'bras dang sbyar zhing stsal lo/ /dper na me phyung ste gso ba ni lci ba dang / rta rtug dang / rtswa la sogs pas bags kyis gso zhing me khad kyis

sbar na me che ba brtan pa dang / thams cad tshos par byed nus pa de dang 'dra ste/ skyug sman gyis nad bsal te/ dang ga sal sal por bya ba la thog mar kha zas drags na mi rung ste/ 'bras thug sla mo la sogs pa ran par sbyin zhing drod cher bya'o/ /de la skyug sman gyis lan

bzhi bzhi slon na phabs chung ba'i tshad do/ /lan drug slon na slon pa'i 'bring tshad do/ /lan brgyad du slon na skyug sman legs pa'i tshad do/ /de la bkru sman gyis bkrus pa'i chung thang ni/ lan bcu 'khrus pa'o/ /'bring tshad ni bcu gsum mo/ /che thang ni lan

bcu bdun no/ /de las 'khrus pa'i babs chung thang ni drug phul gang gi tshad do/ /'bring ni drug phul do'i tshad do/ /'khrus pa'i che thang ni drug phul bzhi 'gyur ro/ /de la skyug sman gyis slon te cho ga'i tshad ni 'khrus pa'i phyed tsam ste/ mjug tu

mkhris pa byung na chog cing ran pa'i tshad do/ /de la bkru sman gyis bkru ste/ bkrus pa'i mjug tu bad kan byung na ran te chog go/ /bkru sman btang ba'i tshe dang po la thur du lan gnyis gsum tsam byung ba ni khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba ni 'khrus pa'i grangs su mi brtsi'o/ /skyug

sman btang ba ni skyug sman 'thungs nas bkrus te slon pa dang / mjug tu mkhris pa 'byung ba'i tshad kyis gzung ngo / /skyug sman gyis slon pa'i 'og tu snum bag btang ba dang / dugs bya ba yang zhag gsum mam lnga'am bdun cho ga byas nas de'i rjes la gdod bkru sman

btang ste/ de yang nang par bad kan gyi dus yol te/ lto sra snyi'i tshod bzung la bkru sman gtang ngo / /de la mi'i rang bzhin mkhris pa che zhing mang la lto snyi ste 'o mas kyang 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rang bzhin rlung gi shas che na lto sra ste bkru sman dri bong dang dan ti la sogs

pas kyang bkru dka'o/ /de la mkhris pa che ba la sman bkru sman ro bska ba dang mngar ba las gtang ngo / /bad kan che ba la sman tsha ba las gtang ngo / /rlung che na snum pa dang drod che ba dang lan tshwa las gtang ngo / /sman btang yang 'khrur mi rung na chu bskol ba dron mo blud do/ /

lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa'am/ gos me la bsros bsros pas dugs bya'o/ /bkru sman btang ba las de nyin par chen po mi 'khru na thong de zan byin la phyi de nyin bkru sman thong shig /gal te nad pa zas yi gar mi 'ong ste kha zas mi tshud dam lto sra ba zhig na snum gtang

ba'i cho ga zhag gsum mam lnga'am bdun du gtang bar bshad pa de bas zhag grangs bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du snum bag thong shig /de'i rjes la lus la dugs kyi cho ga byas nas de'i 'og tu gdod bkru sman gtang ngo / /bkru sman btang ba de yang sngar lan cig 'khrus pa'i tshe/

bkrur ma btub pa de dmigs kyis nyes pa dang / ci las gyur pa legs par bltas te/ sngar cis nyes pa dran par byas la de las thabs ji ltar legs par bkru sman gtang ngo / /bkru sman btang ba las ma legs pa'i nad dmigs snying na/ lto ba na/ zas mi 'ju

ste/ gsud sgregs mnam por 'byung / kha zas yi gar mi 'ong / bad kan mkhris pa gnyis rgyas pa slon par 'gyur/ g.yan pas 'debs/ tsha ba skye/ lus la thor bu 'byung / cham pas 'debs/ thur du dbugs mi 'byung / bshang ba 'byung sra ba 'di

lta bu byung bar gyur na bkru sman ma legs pa yin no/ /de las bkru sman legs pa'i tshul ni ma legs pa'i gnad bshad pa las bzlog par bya ste/ de la dang por ni khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba je 'byung ngo / /de'i rjes la mkhris pa de nas bad kan tha ma rlung 'byung zhing de ltar 'khru

ba ni legs par blta'o/ /de la bkru sman babs che ste ha cang drags pa ni bad kan zad de med pa dang / mkhris pa yang zad de med/ chu skya bor 'khru/ chu nag por 'ong / yang na sha bkrus pa 'dra ba rtsa snar bag can nam chu ser lta bur 'byung / tshil lta bu'i nar nar po'am/

rus bu lta bu 'byung / gzhang phyir 'byung zhing ltogs/ kha skom/ klad pa 'khor/ mig tshags te phugs su bros pa 'di lta bur gyur na bkru sman ha cang drags pa'i tshul yin no/ /bkru sman drags pa dang skyug sman gtang ba'i zas kyi cho ga dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /skyug sman ltar gtang ba'i

cho ga las dud pas gtang ba'i cho ga mi dgos so/ /bkru sman gyi rjes la kha zas bza' ba'i rim pa yang skyug sman gyi cho gar bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ kha zas rim pas bza' zhing bags kyis kha zas nar ma yang phyi nas bza'o/ /gal te bkru sman btang ba las drod chung bas bkru sman ma

zhu zhing nad ma phyin la long brnyas pa ni med/ nad dkyel ni che ba tsam ma yin na sman khong du ma zhu ba'i tshul de ltar gyur na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni/ bkru sman 'thung ba'i nyin thog thag zan mi za bar mtshan yal nas nam zhu zhu ba'i bar du bsdad cing kha zas mi za'o/ /yang na sngar

snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byas la phyis bkru sman btang ba nad gcung la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /bkru sman btang ste bkrus pa dang gtar ga btab pa dang / snum gyi cho gar sbyar te btang ba dang / zas mi za bar smyung bar byas pa 'di rnams kyis ni drod chung zhing

nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po dang 'bras thug sla ba la sogs pa blud cing bags kyis gtang ngo / /bkru sman btang bas mkhris pa dang bad kan bri ste chung ngur gyur pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa che ba'i mi skom dad che ba de lta bu'i mi

la ni thug pa blud du mi rung ste de dag la kha zas bsod pa la sogs pa khad kyis brta ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /nad ma smin pa la ni skyug sman gtang ngo / /nad smin par gyur te bkru sman gtang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang ste nad bsal bar bya'o/ /skyug sman gtang ba ni bkru

sman ltar gtang ba'i dus la ma bab par nad smin pa la bsdad mi dgos par rung ngo / /yang mi nyam chung zhing nad mang ba de lta bu la ni nad nyid smin cing bkru sman gtang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman gtang mi dgos par 'khru bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na 'khru bar 'gyur ro/ /

sngar bkru sman btang ste nyam chung ba dang nad kyang bri ste chung du gyur pa dang / mi sha chung ste skem pa dang / lto sra snyi tshod ma zin pa 'di lta bu la sman thun chung ba dang sman 'jam po thong shig /de lta bas na ches sman lan mang du 'thungs pa bla'o/ /dogs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa'i

sman thun cher ni gtang du mi rung ngo / /nad pa nyam chung ba lta bu la ni sman 'jam zhing thun chung bas nad zhi bar bya'o/ /nad pa nyam chung ba la de ltar dpyad bya ste/ nad mang po cung zad khad kyis bri na de yang sman bags kyis btang zhing nad khad kyis bstsal lo/ /nad dkyel che bas phyin phyin

pas nad pa yun ring du nyon mongs pa de lta bu drod chung / lto sra bar gyur pa yin te de la dpyad du bya ba ni thal sman rnon pos gsha' ra dang / che tsha dang mar du sbyar ba btang na khong pa'i me drod skye ste/ zas 'ju rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyang zhi nas de nas 'khru sman thong shig /nad pa'i

nyams che la khong rtsub/ rlung gi shas che/ lto sra la rtag tu rtsol ba'i ngang tshul can/ khong pa'i drod che ba de lta bu ni bkru sman btang ba yang sman zhu bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de lta bu la ni sngar sman ma btang ba la nyams brtas nas phyis bkru sman 'jam po thong shig /gal te 'khrur

mi rung ngam lan 'ga' zhig 'khrus nas sman rnon po cung zad sbyar ba'i sman reng reng por mas bcug nas/ nad thur du 'khrus te ma phyin pas khong yang 'jam la bkru sman legs pa bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gong du bkru sman btang nas sngar snum gyi cho ga bya bar bshad pa de yang dug

gis phog pa'i mi dang / mtshon gyis rmas pa lta bu dang / thor bu byung ba dang / mdze nad dang / 'or nad dang / me dbal dang / mig ser dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / za khu'i nad yod pa dang / 'di lta bu rnams la ni snum gyi cho ga ha cang cher mi bya ba dang bkru sman

thong shig /de la snum bag gi cho ga bya ba dang / bkru sman btang ba dang thams cad la nad med pa'i khong snum pa la snum gyi cho ga bya ste brtas la skyug sman dang / bkru sman la sogs pa las bya zhing gang btang yang rung ste/ de dag gi bar dang / skabs skabs su snum

gyi cho ga dang dugs kyi cho ga bya'o/ /de ltar snum bag gi cho ga byas pa'i rjes la kha zas kyi nyams 'tshag brtas nas bkru sman gyis nad bsal ba ni dper na gos dri ma can sbangs la bkru ba dang 'dra'o/ /de la snum gyi cho ga dang dugs la sogs pa ma byas par rang gar bkru sman

gtong ba de ni shing skam po dgug tu mi rung ba bzhin du lus ma rung ba'i nyen du 'gyur ro/ /de la cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bkru sman gtang ba legs par bya ba ni sems gsal ba dang dbang po rnams dang / srog zungs rnams brtan pa dang khong du drod che/ me 'bar/

zas myur du 'ju/ rgas sra bar 'ong ste/ bkru sman btang legs pa ni de lta bu yin no/ /skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sman mas gtong ba nyams brta bar bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bcu dgu bshad par bya'o/ /rlung nad

kyi shas che ba de lta bu la ni sman mas gtong zhing brta ste/ lus kyi khong snum par bya ba'i cho ga bzang ngo / /de lta bas na sman dpyad kyi bya ba thams cad kyi nang nas sman mas gtong zhing khong snum zhing nyams brta bar bya ba 'di ni dpyad kyi mchog yin no/ /

de yang nad rnam pa gsum ste nad 'khrur rung pa khong du bsdu ba'i sman mas gtong ba dang / bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba dang / 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba dang / rnam pa gsum mo/ /sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga 'di gsum gyis skran dang lto sbos pa dang / rkang pa na ste 'theng ba dang / mcher pa na

ba dang / rlung nad kyis lto 'khru ba dang / lto na ba dang / rims bying ba dang / cham pa na ba dang / rlung nad kyis khu chu 'gags pa dang / rlung nad las rtug skam du gyur te 'byung du mi rung ba dang / rlig rlugs dang / rde'u nad dang / khu chu la nad yod pa dang / rlung nad dkyel

chen por gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas gtong ba rnam pa gsum gyis nad kun bsal bar bya'o/ /de la sman mas gtong zhing bkrur mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni snum bag btang ha cang drags pa dang glo rdol ba dang lus ha cang skem che ste nyam chung ba lta bu dang / mchin pa na ste be'u

snabs su 'khru ba dang / rtag tu slon bro ba dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus zin pa lta bu dang / sna nas sman btang zin pa dang / dbugs mi bde ste rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang mchil ma mang ste rtag tu 'dor ba dang / gzhang 'brum khrag tshad kyis btab pa dang /

skyigs bus btab pa dang / lto sbos pa dang / drod chung ste zas 'jur mi rung ba lta bu dang / gzhang kha skrangs te na bas sman mas gtong du mi rung ba lta bu dang / kha zas zos zin pa lta bu dang / dmu rdzing gi nad kyis rtsa sgo kun 'gags pa dang / mdze nad dang za khu can

du gyur te gcin sbrang rtsi'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang / bud med sbrum ma zla ba bdun las ma lon pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu la ni sman mas gtong zhing byar mi rung ngo / /de la sman mas gtong zhing nyams brtas te khong snum par bya ba dang / sman mas gtong ba'i bkrur rung ba'i nad

dmigs ni drod ha cang che ba dang / khong rtsub pa dang / rlung nad 'ba' zhig na ba las dmu rdzing du gyur pa lta bu dang / cham pas btab pa dang / ha cang sbom ches pa dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / rlung nad kyi shas ha cang ches pa dang / dbyig dug 'thungs pa dang / 'brum bus

btab pa dang / rkang bam gyi nad dang / lba ba can dang / 'di rnams lta bu'i nad la sman mas gtang zhing bkrur rung ngo / /sman mas gtong ba de dag gi cha spyad sbu gu ni gser la sogs pa dang / shing dang / rus pa dang / 'di rnams kyis gce'u ma gas pa drang la 'jam pa kha zlum

por byas te/ tshad ni byis pa na gzhon te lo gcig ma lon na srid sor lnga'o/ /lo bdun ma lon na srid sor drug go/ /lo bdun lon na srid sor bdun no/ /lo bcu gnyis lon na sor dgu'o/ /lo nyi shu lon pa phan chad la sor bcu gnyis so/ /de yan chad lo grangs kyi bye brag

dang / na tshod dang / nyams stobs dang / lus bong las sbu gu'i tshad bskyed do/ /sbu gu'i tshad kyi sbom ni mthe bong shong ba'i tshad du bya'o/ /rtse mo'i sbom ni mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya'o/ /byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa man chad sor mo'i tshad las phyed phyed kyis de

bskyed de zhabs kyi bu ga'i sbom rab tu che ba dang / sor mo gsum gyi rtse mo nang du shong ba tsam du bya'o/ /gce'u'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad ni mon sran sde'u dang / sran chung dang / sran ma 'di rnams btsos pa shong ba dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong ba'i tshad che chung gi rim pa

de ltar bya'o/ /gce'u'i rtse mo'i gong du khog pa gdags pa'i tshad ni gce'u'i bu ga sbom pa'i tshad dang mnyam par bya'o/ /gce'u nas sman gtong ba'i tshe gce'u'i rtse mo'i kha bkab pa'am/ pags pas bcad de ma bo bar byas nas gtang ngo / /gce'u'i zhabs sbom

po'i kha nas yang sor gnyis su gzhal bar khog pa can de nas mar rim pa gnyis su btags la/ bug pa gnyis kyi bar du sman blugs pa'i snod lug dang ra dang ma he la sogs pa'i lgang pa legs par mnyes pa tshon gyis dmar por btsos pa sra ba phur ma thag thug dang dri nga

ba dang rtsa'i ri mo 'di rnams med cing 'jam la sra ba de lta bu'i gce'u dang sbyar te srad bus legs par bcings la sman blugs nas bde bar bya'o/ /gal te lgang pa'i rkyal bu med na rgyal pa'i dpung pa'am/ byin pa'i bags pa'am/ ras stug po thags

bzang ba spra tshil gyis byugs pa de lta bu la snod du bya'o/ /de la sman mas gtong ste bkru ba'i tshad ni byis pa chung ngu lo gcig la srang gcig gtang ngo / /byis pa chung ngu de lta bu las lo re re lon zhing sman srang re re bskyed de/ lo drug lon nas srang bcu gnyis gtang ngo / /

de yan chad kyang lo grangs las srang gnyis gnyis su bskyed de lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang / lo bco brgyad lon pa nas lo bdun cu lon pa man chad la spyir sman gtang ba'i tshul ni thun rab tu che na yang srang nyi shu gtang ngo / /sman mas gtong ste bkru ba'i thun srang ji snyed cig btang

ba de las dpags te nyams brta zhing khong snum par byas pa'i sman mas gtong ba bzhi cha gcig gi tshad du bya'o/ /de lta bas na nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong du rung ba'i snum bag btang ba dang / dugs bya ba'i cho ga yang byas/ bkru sman btang ste nang gi nad kyang bsal/

'bras thug sla mo dang gar po la sogs pas nyams 'tshag kyang brtas nas nyams brta ba'i sman gtang du rung bar shes na thog ma nyid du nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/ /nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba yang dgun zla bzhi dang dpyid zla gnyis kyi tshe ni nyin par thong shig /

kha cig na re zla ba 'di drug gi tshe mtshan mo yang gtang du rung zhes zer ro/ /so ga dang dbyar dang ston gyi tshe ni mtshan mo thong shig /de la khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya na/ cho ga sngar bya ba la lus mar gyis bsku zhing lde gus dril la chu dron pos lus

dag par bkru/ dro'i kha zas kyi tshad snga na ci za ba'i thang las bzhi gsum ni bza' bzhi cha cig ni mi bza'/ kha zas ci za ba yar phan pa yang ba snum ches pa yang ma yin/ rtsub ches pa yang ma yin pa de lta bu zos la khu ba la sogs pa skom gyi gor btung ba dang / tshal nan yang btung ngo / /

kha zas zos pa'i rjes la bcag par byas na bshang gci bstsal la mal bde bar 'dug na sngas smad nas ro smad bstod de/ glo g.yon gyis phab nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum rkang pa g.yon pa ni rkyong shig /de nas gce'u'i nang nas sman mas gtong ste gce'u'i kha dang gzhang kha yang

snum gyis bsku'o/ /gce'u'i lgang pa nang du sman blugs la dbugs phyir phyung nas kha bcings pa/ sman pa nad pa'i rgyab logs su 'dug nas/ rtabs bag tu sman myur du btang ba'am/ dal zhing thogs pa ma yin par bya zhing gce'u'i nang nas sman nang du btang zhing btsir ba'i

shugs ha cang drags pa'am/ dal ba yang ma yin ran par cig car lan cig tu btsir cing thong shig /lgang pa'i zhabs na rlung lus pa yod kyi sman gyi lhag ma ma lus par gyis shig /sman btang zin nas brla dang rkub tsos la thal mos brdab cing gan rkyal du bzhag

la nad pa nyid rang gi lam la rkang pa'i rting pas brdung bar bya'o/ /sman pa'am/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rkang pa nas bteg ste lan gsum gsigs shig /de nas nad pa sngas bcug nas brkyang ste/ nyal la rkang pa'i rting par nad g.yog gis khu tshur gyis brdung

ba'am/ brla dang byin pa la yang khu tshur gyis brdung zhing lus snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya'o/ /lus la brdung zhing mnyes la mi bde bar byas pa des/ sman slar myur du phyir mi dbyung ngo / /gal te sman slar myur du phyir byung bas phan mi byed par gyur na/ sman mar phyi

ma gzhan yang sbyar la gtang ngo / /khong pa'i drod che bas sman mas gtong ba zhu na nub kar kha zas kyang bza'o/ /zas zos nas de phan chad mtshon thog thag tu ci yang mi bza' mi btung bar nyol cig /gal te sman phyir 'byung du ma rung na sman sbyar ba'i star bu'am/ sman rnon po

lgang pa nas mas gtong zhing khong na sman mar lus pa phyir dbyung ngo / /gal te khong pa'i nang na ha cang rtsub ches pas sman ma zhu ste phyir ma byung ba dang / khong pa'i drod chung bas sman ma zhu ste/ phyir ma byung la nad du gyur pa med na bsdad par bya zhing mtshan mo de bzhin du

'dug par bya'o/ /nang par li dong gra dang / 'u su bskol ba'i chu 'am yang na chu 'ba' zhig gdus pa btung bar bya'o/ /nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong na nyi ma gsum mam/ nyi ma lnga lon na yang thong shig /gal te 'ju ba'i drod che bas sman

zhu ba'am/ yang na rlung gi shas ha cang ches pa dang / rtag tu rtsol zhing bcag par byed pa dang / me'i drod ha cang che ba dang / khong pa'i nang rtsub pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas gtong ba'i nyi ma re re gtang du rung ngo / /de ltar khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba

lan gsum lan bzhi btang nas lus kyi khong dang rtsa 'jam zhing snum par gyur nas nad dbyung zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bkru ba'i sman mas gtong zhing sbyar bar bya'o/ /snga na lus kyi khong rtsub pa las snum par bya ba'i 'og tu nyi ma lnga lon na tshes grangs bzang po'i nyi ma

cung zad phyed yol tsam na sman pas gtor ma dang bkra shis kyi tshig byas la nad pa lus til mar gyis byugs/ dugs byas/ bshang gci'i dri ma bstsal la/ ha cang bkres pa tsam ma yin par 'dug la nad kyi dmigs dang sman la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i mi dang / gang de

la mkhas pa mang po dang / lhan cig tu 'gro zhing sman mas gtong ba'i bkru sman drag po de la sman gyi khu ba sbangs pa chu srang brgyad cu'i bzhi cha gcig ste srang nyi shu dang / po son cha'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgyad dang sbyar te btso zhing de'i nang du mar ni sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i bzhi cha

gcig nang du blugs te btso ma 'di ni rlung nad la btang na thabs de ltar sbyar ro/ /mkhris pa na ba la btang ba dang / na ba med pa nyams tha mal pa la btang na sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu rtsa drug cha gcig gi thang du blugs te btso bar bya'o/ /bad kan gyi nad che ba la btang na sman

gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te btso bar bya'o/ /yang na nad thams cad la sman gyi khu ba'i brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te btsa'o/ /bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba btso ba de yang ha cang mi ska mi sla bar sbyar zhing btso'o/ /de'i nang du bu ram

srang gcig tsam dang sbrang rtsi dang / lce tsha la sogs pa nad dmigs dang sbyar zhing ci rigs par sbags te/ sman lhag ma sbyar te/ sman de thams cad snod cig tu blugs la/ bum pa chu tshan bskol ba'i rlangs pa'i khar bsro zhing / sman dkrugs la gtong ba'i gce'u rkyal

pa'i nang du blugs te/ ha cang mi tsha mi grang / ha cang mi snum mi rtsub/ ha cang mi rno mi 'jam/ ha cang mi gar mi sla/ ha cang mi nyung mi mang / je tsha med pa'am tsha bar yang mi bya/ de dang 'dra bar 'bras tsam yang mi mang mi nyung bar sbyar te/ sman mas gtong zhes mkhas

pa kha cig ni de skad zer ro/ /yang sman pa kha cig na re mar dang sbrang rtsi gnyis kyi tshad so sor srang gsum gsum dang na ba med cing nyams tha mal pa zhig la btang na lce tsha zho gnyis po son cha dang shu ti la sogs pa srang gnyis sbangs pa'i khu ba dang lhag ma'i khu ba srang bcur

sbyar te sman khu sbangs sbangs pa mar dang btsos la sbrang rtsi dang lce tshar sbyar te/ rim pa 'di ltar byas la sman gtang ba'i rkyal bur blugs la/ bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga de ltar bya'o/ /de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas gtong zhing bkru bar sbyar na shing nye rong

dang lce tsha se na ba dang nye'u shing pa dang / a shwa gan+d+ha dang / e raN+Da'i lo ma sman dang sa shing 'jam pa dang skyur ba dang dro ba'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i sman rnams ni rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas gtong bar bzang ngo / /mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman mas gtong zhing bkru

ba'i rnam grangs la gtogs pa la shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / shing u dum+bA ra dang / shing p+lag sha dang / sha pa dang / shing mngar dang / 'o ma dang / nye'u shing dang / 'bri mar dang / ro mngar zhing bsil ba rnams dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba sbrang rtsi dang 'di rnams mkhris pa'i nad

sel ba'i sman mas gtong zhing bkru bar bzang ngo / /bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel ba ni dong ga dang / dug mo yungs dang / pa ta li ga dang / chis khrims dang / shing nim pa dang / sle tres dang / pa Ta dang / ka tu ha ro ha ni dang / shing gi khu ba she le ya kha dang / pu ti ka rany+dza dang /

rak+ta ka rany+dza dang / sap+ta par+Ni zhes bya ba tshigs re la lo ma bdun yod pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang / sman ro tsha zhing rno ba dang drod che ba rnams dang tsha ba rnams sbyar te btsos la sman mas gtong zhing bkrus na/ bad kan gyi nad sel to/ /de la rlung nad dang

mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi nad 'dus par gyur na yang / de gsum gyi sman gong du bshad pa las nad so so'i sman ci ran du shas shas kyis gdus pa btsos pa'i thun spyir mi che ba ran par mas gtong ba'i bkru sman drag po gtang ngo / /rtas bkru ba'i sman mas btang

nas sngas kyis brten te gan rkyal du sems gud du mi g.yengs par sman btang ba de la yid gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas thur du bkru zhing 'ong bar gyur na langs te tsog pur 'dug la bshang bar gyis shig /gal te 'khyims na skad cig thogs te phol du ma rung na sman 'di nyen che

ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu nyen du gyur pa la slar btsos shing dpyad du bya ba la mar dang nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal sman rnon po dang / ba gcin dang 'bras kyi rtsabs kyi khu ba skyur mo dang sbyar la btsos pa 'jam zhing rno la dro bar sbyar te/ sman mas gtong ba'i rkyal bu gzhan

du blugs te bshams la mas gtong zhing tshir cig /yang na po son cha las sbyar ba'i sman gyis gdab mu las gzhug pa bya zhing sdang ba yang bya'o/ /yang na 'di ltar ma gyur te sman mas gtong yang 'ong bar gyur na sman phyi ma sbyar te/ rkyal bur blugs la lan gsum lan bzhi'i

bar du yang sman drag po mas gtong zhing legs par btang nas de'i rjes la kha zas kyi cho ga ni bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bar shes par byas la kha zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol du chu dron pos khrus byas nas kha zas bza' ba'i thabs ni 'bras thug rkyang rkyang po dang / 'bras thug sla mo

btung / sha khu sla mo dang 'bras chan du sbyar te bza'/ sman drag po mas gtong ste bkrus pas khong pa'i dri ma nad kun phyin na/ khong pa nang 'phyang bag tu 'dug pa dang / nyam chung ste khong rmya ba de lta bur gyur pa de la chu dron po bde bas khrus byas nas kha zas cho ga bzhin du zos na

lus zhig cing rmya ba la phan te/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sman de ltar mas gtong ste/ bkrus pa las rlung nad kyi bar du khong pa sbo bas grang bar 'gyur te/ mi bde na yang de'i mod la 'phral du rlung zhi bar 'gyur ba'i sman btsos te mas gtong zhing khong 'jam zhing snum par 'gyur

bar bya'o/ /sman mas gtong ste bkrus pa legs pa'i tshul dang / ha cang drags pa dang thun chung ste ma 'khrus par gyur pa 'di rnams kyi tshul ni sngar snum gyi cho ga bya zhing btang ba legs/ ma legs par bshad pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /sman mas gtong ste

bkrus pa'i rjes rlung nad du gyur pa la khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa'i sman mas gtong ba cung zad tsam zhig bsdad na khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba dang bcas te sman mar dang cig car 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thur du dbug pa yang sman mar lhan cig 'ong bar gyur na/ khong snum zhing

'jam par 'gyur ba'i sman mas gtong ba legs pa yin no/ /yang bad kan gyi bag che na de la khong brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan gcig gam lan gsum gyi bar du thong shig mkhris pa rgyas pa'i shas che na/ brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan lnga 'am lan bdun gyis shig /

rlung nad la brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan dgu 'am bcu gcig tu thong shig /de ltar brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba'i lan grangs zung du ma gyur par byas nas gal te de'i rjes la bkru ba'i sman mas gtong bar 'dod na yang thong shig /de ltar sman mas gtong ba'i rjes la

bad kan dang mkhris pa dang / rlung nad sel ba'i kha zas mon sran sde'u'i tshod ma khu ba can dang / 'o ma dang khu sha 'di gsum zos na nad kyi rim pa bzhin du phan no/ /de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman drag po mas gtong zhing khong snum la brta bar bya na/ shing nye rong dang lce

tsha sne bda' ba dang sbyar te snum dang / mngar dang 'bras rtsabs skyur ba dang / sha khu dang drod che ba'i bag sbyar te bskol la rkyal bur blugs te btang ba 'di ni rlung nad gcig pu la phan no/ /mkhris pa'i nad la ni n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangs su gtogs pa dang /

shug pa dang kha ra dang / mngar bag bsil bag dang mar dang 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang 'di rnams sbyar te gdus la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ sman mas gtong na mkhris pa'i nad 'byang zhing me'i khong brta la snum par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan gyi nad la dong

ga la sogs pa dang / dug mo yungs la sogs pa dang / sman rtsub pa rnams dang / ba gcin dang sman rno ba dang / drod che ba dang / ro tsha ba dang / 'di rnams bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mas gtong na bad kan gyi nad 'byang ngo / /de la rlung nad la ni lan gcig gtang ngo / /

mkhris pa'i nad la lan gnyis gtang ngo / /bad kan gyi nad la lan gsum gtang bar bya'o/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad la yang sman dpyad de gsum rim pas btang na 'dus pa'i nad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dpyad kyi slob dpon spyod pa can na re/

yang mi'i nad gzhi ni rlung dang bad kan dang / mkhris pa gsum du zad de nad 'di gsum bstsal ba'i dpyad bkru ba'i mas gtong ba las gud na dpyad rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba med de/ de'i phyir sman mas gtang bar bya'o/ /rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad/ khong nas bskyod

cing sdud pa dang / nad bkru ste byang bar bya ba dang / nad zhi bar byas te/ 'di lta bu yang rim gyis bya ba yin te/ de'i phyir nad rnam pa gsum bkru ba'i dpyad mas gtong zhing bkru bar bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de ltar sman btang ba yang nad dmigs dang sman la sogs pa'i mthu dang /

nad pa'i nyams stobs dang / de thams cad kyi tshod zin par byas la sman gtang ngo / /bkru sman btang ba legs pa'i tshul mthong / ma dpags kyi bar du bkru ba'i sman btang ba'i rjes gcad du mi rung ngo / /yang khong snum zhing 'jam pa bda' ba'i sman mas gtong ba dang / bkru

ba'i sman mas gtong ba gang yang rung ste/ lan gcig gtang yang mi rung lan mang du gtang ba yang mi rung ngo / /de la khong brta zhing snum pa'i sman mas gtong ba ni nad khong nas bskyod cing bsdu ba dang / khong pa'i drod ni chung bar 'gyur ro/ /bkru ba'i sman btang ba la 'jig pa'i

rten ni rlung nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /sman mas gtong ba'i rim pa ni sngar lus kyi khong 'jam zhing snum par bya ba'i sman de gtang ngo / /de'i 'og tu bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ngo / /de'i rjes la khong brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/ /sman mas gtong ba'i dpyad byas

pa ni rlung nad dang / bad kan mkhris pa'i nad gsum char sel te khong snum zhing brta bar bya ba'i sman mas gtong ba dang / bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga rig par bya ba ni de lta bu yin no/ /yang sman mar thun chung ngu'i thang du tshod bzung ste/ btung ba dang khong 'jam zhing

brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba thun chung ngu'i thang du tshod bzung ste rtag tu gtang bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar thun chung ngu'i thang du btung na/ nad pa'i drod dang nyams las kyang dpags te srang gcig tsam btung ngo / /brta ba'i sman mas gtong ba ni srang gnyis tsam thong shig /

de la sman mar thun chung ngur btang ba'i mi ni byis pa dang rgan po dang / lam rings kyis dub pa'i mi dang / khur gyis dub pa dang / bud med la brten drags pa'i lta bu dang / drag shul byas pa lta bu dang / sems las che ba dang / rlung nad kyis lus zhom pa dang / rid pa

dang / drod chung ba dang / rgyal po dang phyug po lta bu bde zhing longs spyod pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu la sman mar thun chung ngu gtang dgos te/ thun chung ngu rtag tu 'thungs na nad kun sel/ kha zas kyi cho ga la sogs pa bsrung zhing spang ba med pa la sha skye/ bshang gci dri ma

snyi ste bde blag tu 'ong ste bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med rnams kyi nad mo mtshan na ba dang / mngal gyi gnas na ba dang / sman mas gtong ba'i rim pa ni dang por khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa'i sman mas je btang la/ de'i 'og tu bkru ba'i sman mas gtong ba lan gnyis sam

gsum thong shig /mjug tu ni nyams 'tshag brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/ /de la skyes pa chu so na rde'u yod pa lta bu dang chu 'gags pa lta bu la pho mtshan nas sman mas gtong nas gce'u'i srid tshad ni nad pa nyid kyi sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du gser dngul la sogs pa las

brdung sa pa'i zlum po ba mjug lta bu zhabs dang bar gnyis ka'i rna ba btags la rtse mo'i bu ga ni yungs kar btsos pa shong ba tsam du btod la/ /'jam par byas te/ gce'u'i rtse mo me tog kun da'am/ sri shing gi me tog lta bu rtse mo byin gyis phra zhing sra

bar bya zhing / sman gtong ba'i snod rkyal bu ni 'jam zhing yang bar bya'o/ /tshad ni pho ru gang shong ba tsam las che chung gang rigs par bya'o/ /de ltar sman mas gtong bar byed pa sngar khrus la kha zas 'ju sla zhing yang bar na par zos nas khong snum zhing 'jam pa'i sman cho ga bzhin du pho
